snippet: LEAD: Because of an editing error, an article in Business Day on Tuesday about the political ties of a savings and loan owner, Carl M. Rheuban, misstated the Federal charges on which a business associate, Michael R. Goland, was convicted last mont...
lead_paragraph: LEAD: Because of an editing error, an article in Business Day on Tuesday about the political ties of a savings and loan owner, Carl M. Rheuban, misstated the Federal charges on which a business associate, Michael R. Goland, was convicted last month. He was convicted of having exceeded the individual donation limit in contributions to a third-party candidate in the 1986 Senate race in California won by Alan Cranston.
